body:
Also add external package detection, master version, and a variant to enable/disable documentation.

I'm able to successfully build master on macOS 10.15.6 with Apple Clang 11.0.3. ~3.1.2 has a few build issues on macOS related to code signing: https://github.com/fish-shell/fish-shell/issues/7310~ 3.1.2 also builds and passes all unit tests.

Depends on #18524 
Depends on #18525
title: fish: add dependencies
